# ENTITY::GET_NEAREST_PLAYER_TO_ENTITY

## Parameters
* **ENTITY_INDEX** entity: We want closest player to

## Returns
* **INT**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Get the closest player to an entity
